author: Albert Einstein
quotes: Life is like riding a bicycle. To keep your balance, you must keep moving.
Imagination is more important than knowledge.

author: Maya Angelou
quotes: You will face many defeats in life, but never let yourself be defeated.
Try to be a rainbow in someone else's cloud.

author: Mark Twain
quotes: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.
The best way to cheer yourself up is to try to cheer somebody else up.
